mapper.select: SELECT e.EBOARD_NO, e.GUBUN_NO , e.CGORY_NO, e.EMP_ID, e.EMP_NAME,TO_CHAR(e.EBOARD_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')EBOARD_REGDATE, e.EBOARD_DELFLAG, f.FLIST_SEQ, f.FLIST_UUID, f.FLIST_ORIGINNAME, f.FLIST_SIZE, f.FLIST_UPLOADPATH FROM ENTRBOARD e LEFT JOIN FILELIST f ON e.EBOARD_NO = f.EBOARD_NO WHERE e.CGORY_NO = '201' AND e.EBOARD_DELFLAG = 'N' ORDER BY EBOARD_REGDATE DESC
